data.eml:eml: At the lower size limit for tetrapods, two new species of the miniaturized frog genus Paedophryne (Anura, Microhylidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kraus, Fred (2011): At the lower size limit for tetrapods, two new species of the miniaturized frog genus Paedophryne (Anura, Microhylidae). ZooKeys 154: 71-88, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.154.1963, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.154.1963
